main.name: Rahul
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: As a student, I am always energetic and eager to learn new skills along with the study. I love learning new technologies, programming languages and concepts. I always try to learn some practical knowledge in diverse fields as well. I have experience working as part of a team and individually.

resume.skillmessage: I love to work in these following skills.

education.description: The Indian Institute of Technology Patna is an autonomous institute of education and research in science, engineering and technology located in Patna, India. It is recognized as an Institute of National Importance by the Government of India.
I have completed my education till intermediate level from this school. It is a CBSE based school offering English medium of education. It is located at Mahammadpur, Patna.
education._comment: description : Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.company: Winter Research Internship, TCS Research & Innovation
work.title: Gestures Recognition for Human-Robot Interaction
work.description: This project aims to build a monocular vision based robust gesture identification network for natural human robot interaction. To enlighten the project it has been decided that the identification would consist of those gestures which are commonly used while interaction between human to human and as per identified gesture command will be given to robot for its movement.

work.title: Multi-Task Learning For Automated Essay Scoring
work.description: This project aims to build a machine learning system for automatic scoring of essays written by students. The basic idea is to build a multi-task learning system which can model the attributes like language fluency, vocabulary, structure, organization, content, etc. simultaneously along with calculating the overall score of the essay.

work.title: STUDENT MENTOR
work.description: Student Mentorship Program (SMP) - A 1-year program which has been launched with the aim of providing a platform for 1st-year students to interact with seniors from the same department and to motivate students to excel in both academic and non-academic fields and to make the most of their life at IIT Patna and beyond.

work.company: Sparkonics, Electrical Club at IIT Patna
work.title: SUB-COORDINATOR
work.description: I was in the Learning division under Sparkonics. At its core, I personally believe on being a mentor is being a trusted advisor. I involved myself available to support and advise my juniors when they need it , and always keeping their best interests in mind.

publication.publication_title: Online Feature Selection for Multi-label Classification in Multiobjective Optimization Framework
publication.authors: Rahul Kumar, Dipanjyoti Paul, Sriparna Saha and Jimson Mathew
publication.publication: Proceedings of the 2019 IEEE/ACM International Conference on Advances in Social Networks Analysis and Mining
publication.description: This paper addresses the online feature selection problem in multi-label classification framework where multi-labeled data with features arriving in an online fashion is considered as input. The developed multi-label online feature selection algorithm automatically determines the best subset of features that is suitable for multi-label classification of the given online dataset.

skills.name: Python/C++
skills.description: I use these two programming languages very often in projects or solving data structure and algorithms problems. As C was my first lanaguage that I started using in college.

skills.name: Keras
skills.description: I prefer Keras over other deep learning libraries as it provides a high-level neural networks API which is capable of running on top of either Tensorflow, CNTK, Theano.

skills.name: Matlab
skills.description: I used Matlab in some of my projects.It is very good at performing matrix operations making it useful for things like image operations.It also excels at its plotting functions.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for distributed version-control system for tracking changes in source code.It is the fast and flexible version control tool.

skills.name: Javascript (ES6)
skills.description: I used Javascript(ES6) in building this personal website which is generally used to create dynamic and interactive experience for the user.It is the most commonly used as a client side scripting language.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website.

skills.name: Heroku
skills.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

testimonials.text: Rahul worked with me as an Intern. He never shies away from exploring new things. He is a well organised person and a good team player. During the Internship, he worked on solving computer vision problem using deep learning. Though he did not have much prior knowledge, he did a wonderful job with live demonstration of his work.
